sentences.en: Conclusions Sensory nerve implantation a good effect on restoration of the denervated glabrous skin in primate.
sentences.cn: 结论感觉神经植入术在灵长类动物失神经无毛皮肤有良好感觉再生.

sentences.en: Description: Evergreen shrubs or small trees , up to 12 m tall; branchlets glabrous.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 常绿灌木或小乔木, 高达12米; 小枝无毛.

sentences.en: Description: Evergreen shrubs or small trees, 3 - 8 m tall, glabrous.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 常绿灌木或小乔木, 高3-8米,全株无毛.

sentences.en: Description: Herbaceous vines, glabrous except for pubescent on stem nodes, petioles, and leaf margin.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 纤细草质藤本,除茎节 、 柄和叶缘被短柔毛外全株无毛.

sentences.en: Description: Perennial herbaceous vines, with milky juice , glabrous throughout.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 多年生草质藤本, 全体无毛, 有乳汁.

sentences.en: Description: Shrubs, 2 - 5 m tall; branchets almost glabrous.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 灌木或小乔木, 高2-5米; 枝近无毛.

sentences.en: Description: Small trees, 4 - 5 m tall, glabrous throughout.
sentences.cn: 形态特徵: 小乔木, 高 4-5 米,全株无毛.

sentences.en: Objective : To improve a TLC identification condition for Glabrous Sarcandra Herb to enhance its sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 目的: 优化九节茶薄层鉴别色谱条件,以提高鉴别的灵敏度.

sentences.en: Objective To assess the sensory restoration of the denervated glabrous skin in primate following sensory implantation.
sentences.cn: 目的评价感觉神经植入术在灵长类动物失神经无毛皮肤的感觉重建效果.

trans.tran_en: without hair or a similar growth; smooth
